name: I Ain't Got No Body
description:
Oh no, you're dead! And what's even worse, looks like you got a-head of yourself 😉 You wake up in a graveyard infested by zombies. Find a way to get out... Maybe you're going to need a hand, literally!

Controls:
This game is mouse-only. Drag the cursor while holding the left button down to move in that direction. Press the right button to perform special actions.

 Credits:
Code & Animation: WeaverDev
Art & Sounds: SquareDev
Music & SFX: Freesound.org, incompetech.com/music/

Ending song from https://filmmusic.io
"Surf Shimmy" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
